mapper.sql: id, order_no, farmer_id, device_id, code, year, month, type, start_time, end_time, use_water, use_electricity, use_money, use_water_first, use_water_second, use_water_third, use_money_first, use_money_second, use_money_third
mapper.select: select sum(use_water) from t_water_use_records where code like concat(#{code}, '%') and year = #{year} group by month order by month
select name, code from t_area where status = #{status} and code like concat(#{code}, '%')

select d.name as deviceName, f.name as farmerName, wur.* from t_water_use_records wur left join t_device d on wur.device_id = d.id left join t_farmer f on wur.farmer_id = f.id
and wur.code like concat(#{code}, '%')
and f.name like concat(#{farmerName}, '%')
and d.name like concat(#{deviceName}, '%')
and wur.type = #{type}
order by wur.id DESC
select sum(use_water) from t_water_use_records where code like concat(#{code}, '%') and Date(end_time) = #{date};
